column3: The arrangement of elements in a garment, hairstyle, makeup or other fashion.
A distinctive, often recurring look in fashion.
Items which are worn in addition to clothing, such as jewelry, watches, hats, scarves, and belts.
The feel of a garment or any clothing item.
A style in which multiple garments of various lengths are worn over each other.
The process of modifying a garment to fit the wearer's body.
